article: Kate is  _  American girl. She  looks like  her mother. She lives in Dafeng  _  her father and mother, Mr and Mrs King. Mr King works in a factory. Mrs King is a teacher in our school. She teaches  _  English.  All of us  are friendly to her and she loves us, too. Kate  has  a lot of friends. She often plays with them. Kate likes  eating  Chinese food very much.  On  Sunday morning she often goes  shopping  with her mother. They often buy a lot of things. Mrs King says the things in Dafeng  _  very cheap.
